name: ipomoea
content:
Add to word list

a group of climbing plants with large, open, colourful flowers that includes morning glory, bindweed, and sweet potato: Its rich purple flowers are nearly as large as those of an Ipomoea or morning glory. Sweet potato is a fibrous tuber of the species Ipomoea batatas, indigenous to the tropical Americas. See also
